scripts.build-ng: cd public; ng build --prod; cd ..; mkdir -p ./build/public; cp -a ./public/dist/baby-names/. ./build/public
scripts.build-ts: tsc; cp -R ./node_modules ./build/services; cd ./build/services ; zip -qr list-guesses.zip list-guesses.js node_modules; zip -qr list-user-guesses.zip list-user-guesses.js node_modules; zip -qr submit-guess.zip submit-guess.js node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build-ng && npm run build-ts
scripts.plan: cd .tf; terraform init; terraform plan; cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd ./tf && terraform apply && cd ..
